1371: Saxiardis was born in Papenhofstede in 1371.
1374: Lost mother at the age of 3.
Ludolphus took care of Saxiardis since Saxiardis was 4.
1375: Lost father at the age of 4.
Left Papenhofstede.A.3 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 5.
1376: Lost sibling Heilsota in 1376 when Heilsota was 4.
1388: Got married to Wigboldo at age 18 in 1388.
Was taken out of orphanage at age 18.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
Saxiardis moved to Potstraet.A.2 after marriage.
Moved in with husband Wigboldo after marriage.
1389: Gave birth to Saxiardis in 1389 at age 18.
1391: Gave birth to Waldrada in 1391 at age 20.
1392: Lost daughter Saxiardis when Saxiardis was 4 years old.
1394: Gave birth to Walburgis in 1394 at age 23.
1396: Died while giving birth to Erkenradis in 1396 at age 25.
